attributes.action: Revert to teacher assessments for 2021 A Levels & GCSEs.
attributes.additional_details: The 2020 cohort at the time would have had 8 weeks worth of disruption and received teacher assessed grades, the 2021 are still in the middle of this pandemic and serious disruption continues. It is grossly unfair to expect English students to sit exams. Also call for Gavin Williamson to stand down as he has proven time after time throughout 2020 that he simply is not fit for the role.
attributes.background: Trust teachers to deliver correct and fair A level & GCSE results for 2021. They are the professionals, not Gavin Williamsons faceless panel.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553307

We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.
